channel.title: How to replace compiler and run.bat?

item.title: How to replace compiler and run.bat?
item.dc:creator: @killamess killamess
item.description:
@killamess wrote:

find your run.bat and compile.bat and right click edit and then copy them over the previous ones and save

item.title: How to replace compiler and run.bat?
item.dc:creator: @x_i_dominate_x x i dominate x
item.description:
@x_i_dominate_x wrote:

If some1 could tell me how to replace the compiler with this it’d be greatly appreciated-

@echo off
color 0a
title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

And the run.bat with this…

@echo off
java -Xmx500M server
pause

Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: How to replace compiler and run.bat?
